consent.location_consent_message:
needs your location access to bring the nearest engineer at your service. 
 Click on 'Continue' to proceed to the permission request page or 'Next' to move the next page. However you can always change your preference through the settings page provided in the app
consent.notification_consent_message:
requires Notification permission to give update about the events.
 Click on 'Continue' to proceed to the permission request page or 'Next' to move the next page. However you can always change your preference through the settings page provided in the app
consent.camera_consent_message:
requires Camera permission to capture images of machines, parts etc..
 Click on 'Continue' to proceed to the permission request page or 'Next' to move the next page. However you can always change your preference through the settings page provided in the app
consent.storage_consent_message:
requires Storage permission to store app related files in device.
 Click on 'Continue' to proceed to the permission request page or 'Exit' to exit the application.
